title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.20 - Restrictions upon taxiing or positioning of aircraft to avoid dangerous propeller wash or jet exhaust blast
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.20 - Restrictions upon taxiing or positioning of aircraft to avoid dangerous propeller wash or jet exhaust blast

State Regulations

No aircraft shall be taxied or positioned at the airport
where the propeller wash or jet exhaust blast may cause injury to persons or
cause damage to property. If it would be impossible to taxi such aircraft
without violating the above restrictions, then the engine or engines shall not
be started and the aircraft shall be towed to the desired
destination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
78.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
